rukus.text: Ate ika nisani unham la'i murada zamina hai. Usa nu asim jivata kita ate usa vicom asim anaja paida kita, so uha usa vico khande hana
Ate asim usa vica khazura ate agura de baga bana'e ate usa vica asim jharane vaga'e
Tam ki loka usa de fala khana. Ate usanu unham de hatham ne nahim bana'i'a tam ki'um uha sukara ada nahim karade
Uha hasati pavitara hai jisa ne sari'am cizam de jore bana'e. Unham vicom vi jinham nu dharati paida karadi hai ate khuda unham de adara tom vi. Ate unham vicom vi jinham nu uha nahim' janade
Ate ika nisani unham la'i rata hai asim usa vicom dina nu bica lainde ham tam uha hanere vica rahi jande hana
Ate suraja uha mithe ho'e raha ute calada hai. Iha saravasakatimana ate saravagi'ata da banhi'a ho'i'a haimana hai
Ate asim cana la'i vi usadi'am mauzilam tai'a kara diti'am hana, ithom taka ki uha ajiha bana janda hai jivem khajura di purani sakha
Na suraja de vasa vica hai ki uha cana nu pharha lave ate na rata dina tom pahilam a sakadi hai. Ate sare ika ika da'ire vica taira rahe hana
Ate ika nisani inham la'i iha vi hai ki asim inham di nasala nu bhari ho'i beri vica savara kita
Ate asim unham la'i unham varagi'am hora cizam painda kiti'am jinham te iha savara hude hana
Ate jekara asim cahi'e tam asim inham nu doba de'i'e, phira na ko'i inham di pukara sunana vala hovega ate na hi iha baca'e ja sakanage
Paratu iha sadi rahimata hai, unham nu ika mithe samem taka labha dena
Ate jadom unham nu kiha janda hai ki usa tom darom jihare tuhade age ate tuhade piche hana tam ki tuhade upara rahimata kiti jave
Ate unham de raba di'am nisani'am vicom ko'i nisani vi unham de pasa ajihi nahim a'undi jisa tom uha muha na morade hona

Ate jadom unham nu kiha janda hai ki alaha ne jihara kujha tuhanu dita hai tusim usa vicom kharaca karo tam jinham lokam ne inakara kita uha imana vali'am nu akhade hana ki asim ajihe lokam nu khu'a'i'e jinham nu alaha zahuda hove tam uha unham nu khu'a dida. Tusim loka tam sapasata kurahe pa'e ho
Ate uha kahide hana ki iha va'ada kadom (pura) hovega. (Daso)? Jekara tusim sace ho
Iha loka sirafa ika caghi'ara da raha dekha rahe hana, jihari inham nu a pharhegi ate iha larade hi rahi janage
Phira uha na ko'i vasi'ata kara sakanage ate na apane lokam vala vapisa ja sakanage
